conclusion: Need to analyze velocity-time graphs to determine when objects A and B are farthest apart
Object A starts at position 0 at time t1
Object B starts at position 0 at time t1
Object A reaches its maximum velocity at time t2
Object B reaches its maximum velocity at time t2
At t1, both objects are at the same position
At t2, object A has reached its maximum velocity, and object B has not yet reached its maximum velocity
The farthest apart they are is when object A has reached its maximum velocity and object B has not yet reached its maximum velocity
Therefore, the two objects are farthest apart at t2
The two objects are farthest apart at t2
